backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data types and initializing insights, solution features, range scenarios, and demo interactions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two animation-removal features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text mappings providing short predefined summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata and loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that initializes backend data and renders all top-level sections with theming and UI providers.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedRoadHero: Hero section with background image, headline, and navigation buttons for scrolling to demo and problem sections.
frontend/src/components/animations/motio: Defines shared animation timing, easing, and stagger values for motion effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive header with navigation links and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/UncertaintyBandC: Renders a horizontal uncertainty band visualization showing worst, predicted, best case, and trip distance markers. Computes percentage positions and displays them with styled gradients and labels.
frontend/src/content/fallbackContent.ts: Provides static fallback insight and solution feature data used when backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context for Internet Identity, including login, logout, and persistence of identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps actor calls in React Query hooks for fetching insights, features, range scenarios, stats, and recording interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with an EV-focused color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/presentation/PresentationMo: Implements slideshow-style presentation mode with navigation, slide rendering, and optional embedded charts.
frontend/src/presentation/slides.ts: Defines a Slide interface and a list of presentation slides covering the problem, insights, solution, impact, feasibility, and risks.
Renders expected impact metrics and a detailed cost breakdown with UI cards and icons.
frontend/src/sections/InsightsSection.ts: Displays key insights from backend or fallback data using cards with titles, summaries, and implications.
frontend/src/sections/ProblemSection.tsx: Shows main EV range-anxiety pain points and outlines vehicle parameters and solution constraints.
frontend/src/sections/RangeConfidenceDem: Interactive demo allowing users to adjust trip parameters and view calculated range confidence outputs.
frontend/src/sections/SolutionSection.ts: Presents the three-module software solution using tabbed UI with feature descriptions and impacts.
frontend/src/sections/WhatIfDefensibilit: Renders a tabbed UI for what‑if defensibility scenarios, showing scenario details and results from applyScenario().
frontend/src/utils/rangeModel.ts: Computes EV range predictions, uncertainty, confidence scoring, and driving recommendations based on environmental and driving inputs.
frontend/src/utils/scenarioEngine.ts: Returns predefined scenario outcomes with confidence, range estimates, buffers, and recommended actions based on scenario ID.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theming, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project goals, constraints, features, architectural notes, and overall state for the EV range‑anxiety prototype.
